data.taskTitle: Add keyboard shortcut for START dropdown
Add keyboard shortcut for START dropdown
data.approach: Add global Alt+S keyboard listener to open START dropdown programmatically. Will find or expose a function to toggle showSwarmDropdown state.

summary: Added Alt+S keyboard shortcut to open START NEXT dropdown from anywhere
Created isStartDropdownOpen store in drawerStore.ts following EpicSwarmModal pattern
Added global keyboard handler in +layout.svelte handleGlobalKeydown function
Made TopBar subscribe to store and sync local showSwarmDropdown state
Updated button tooltip to show Alt+S shortcut hint

suggestedTasks.title: Add keyboard shortcut hints panel to dashboard
suggestedTasks.description: Create a help panel or modal that lists all available keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+K, Alt+N, Alt+E, Alt+S, etc). Could be triggered by ? key or from Help menu.
suggestedTasks.reason: With multiple shortcuts now available, users need a discoverable way to learn them

suggestedTasks.title: Add Escape key to close START dropdown
suggestedTasks.description: Currently the dropdown only closes on mouse leave or clicking elsewhere. Add Escape key handler for keyboard-only workflow.
suggestedTasks.reason: Completes the keyboard-first workflow for the START dropdown

patterns: Use drawerStore.ts for global UI state that needs keyboard shortcut access
Add keyboard handlers in +layout.svelte handleGlobalKeydown function
Components subscribe to stores via $effect with unsubscribe cleanup
gotchas: TopBar uses local showSwarmDropdown state with hover logic - must sync both store and local state
Clear swarmDropdownTimeout when opening via keyboard to prevent auto-close
